sentences.sentence: GNOME has a new set of features for text controls.
sentences.translation: GNOME 拥有一组新的用于文本控件的特性。

sentences.sentence: In writing your applications, you can use all the shared facilities of the GNOME platform, making your development time even more efficient.
sentences.translation: 在编写应用程序时，您可以使用 GNOME 平台的所有共享工具，从而使您的开发时间更加高效。

sentences.sentence: It turns out to be something like a gnome or an elf.
sentences.translation: 它看起来像一个侏儒或一个矮人。
